short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays DNS info of user's DNS server

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily monitor your network settings with the Subnet & DNS Checker Chrome extension. This handy tool allows you to quickly check your current client subnet and DNS server information with just a click. Whether you're troubleshooting connectivity issues or ensuring your network configuration is optimal, this extension provides real-time insights into your IP address, subnet mask, and DNS server details. Stay informed and enhance your browsing experience with the Subnet & DNS Checker!
